name: loro-crdt
description: Loro CRDTs is a high-performance CRDT framework that makes your app state synchronized, collaborative and maintainable effortlessly.

scripts.build-dev: deno run -A ./scripts/build.ts dev && rollup -c && deno run -A ./scripts/post-rollup.ts && npm run test
scripts.build-release: deno run -A ./scripts/build.ts release && rollup -c && deno run -A ./scripts/post-rollup.ts && npm run test
